Iris

In words or in pictures, in print or online, we love helping people get their message across.

We’re a small creative agency based in Leeds. Having worked with independents, social enterprises and charities, we know they’re the kind of people we like helping most. That means we don’t assume massive budgets, deliver jargon-filled pitches or make unethical choices.

What we do:

  • Branding
  • Web design
  • Illustration
  • Signage
  • Campaigns
  • Fundraising
  • Social media
  • Digital democracy
